verses.verse: Let a man<WG444> regard<WG3049> us in this<WG3779> manner,<WG3779> as servants<WG5257> of Christ,<WG5547> and stewards<WG3623> of the mysteries<WG3466> of God.<WG2316>
In this<WG5602> case,<WG5602> moreover,<WG3062> it is required<WG523> of stewards<WG3623> that one<WG5100> be found<WG2147> trustworthy.<WG4103>

But to me it is a very<WG1646> small<WG1646> thing<WG1646> that I should be examined<WG350> by you, or<WG2228> by [any] human<WG442> court;<WG2250> in fact,<WG235> I do not even<WG3761> examine<WG350> myself.<WG1683>
For I am<WG4924> conscious<WG4924> of nothing<WG3762> against myself,<WG1683> yet<WG235> I am not by this<WG3778> acquitted;<WG1344> but the one who examines<WG350> me is the Lord.<WG2962>

Therefore<WG5620> do not go on passing<WG2919> judgment<WG2919> before<WG4253> the time,<WG2540> [but wait] until<WG2193> the Lord<WG2962> comes<WG2064> who<WG3739> will both<WG2532> bring<WG5461> to light<WG5461> the things<WG2927> hidden<WG2927> in the darkness<WG4655> and disclose<WG5319> the motives<WG1012> of [men's] hearts;<WG2588> and then<WG5119> each<WG1538> man's praise<WG1868> will come<WG1096> to him from God.<WG2316>

Now<WG1161> these<WG3778> things,<WG3778> brethren,<WG80> I have figuratively<WG3345> applied<WG3345> to myself<WG1683> and Apollos<WG625> for your sakes,<WG1223> that in us you might learn<WG3129> not to exceed<WG5228> what<WG3739> is written,<WG1125> in order<WG2443> that no<WG3361> one<WG1520> of you might become arrogant<WG5448> in behalf<WG5228> of one<WG1520> against<WG2596> the other.<WG2087>

For who<WG5101> regards<WG1252> you as superior<WG1252>? And what<WG5101> do you have<WG2192> that you did not receive<WG2983>? But if<WG1487> you did receive<WG2983> it, why<WG5101> do you boast<WG2744> as if<WG5613> you had not received<WG2983> it?

You are already<WG2235> filled,<WG2880> you have already<WG2235> become<WG4147> rich,<WG4147> you have become<WG936> kings<WG936> without<WG5565> us; and [I] would<WG3785> indeed<WG1065> that you had become<WG936> kings<WG936> so<WG2443> that we also<WG2532> might reign<WG4821> with you.

For, I think,<WG1380> God<WG2316> has exhibited<WG584> us apostles<WG652> last<WG2078> of all,<WG2078> as men<WG1935> condemned<WG1935> to death;<WG1935> because<WG3754> we have become<WG1096> a spectacle<WG2302> to the world,<WG2889> both<WG2532> to angels<WG32> and to men.<WG444>

We are fools<WG3474> for Christ<WG5547>'s sake,<WG1223> but you are prudent<WG5429> in Christ; we are weak,<WG772> but you are strong;<WG2478> you are distinguished,<WG1741> but we are without<WG820> honor.<WG820>

To this<WG3588> present<WG737> hour<WG5610> we are both<WG2532> hungry<WG3983> and thirsty,<WG1372> and are poorly<WG1130> clothed,<WG1130> and are roughly<WG2852> treated,<WG2852> and are homeless;<WG790>
and we toil,<WG2872> working<WG2038> with our own<WG2398> hands;<WG5495> when we are reviled,<WG3058> we bless;<WG2127> when we are persecuted,<WG1377> we endure;<WG430>

when we are slandered,<WG7049> we try to conciliate;<WG3870> we have become<WG1096> as the scum<WG4027> of the world,<WG2889> the dregs<WG4067> of all<WG3956> things,<WG3956> [even] until<WG2193> now.<WG737>
I do not write<WG1125> these<WG3778> things<WG3778> to shame<WG1788> you, but to admonish<WG3560> you as my beloved<WG27> children.<WG5043>

For if<WG1437> you were to have<WG2192> countless<WG3463> tutors<WG3807> in Christ,<WG5547> yet<WG235> [you would] not [have] many<WG4183> fathers;<WG3962> for in Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424> I became<WG1080> your father<WG1080> through<WG1223> the gospel.<WG2098>
I exhort<WG3870> you therefore,<WG3767> be imitators<WG3402> of me.

For this<WG3778> reason<WG1223> I have sent<WG3992> to you Timothy,<WG5095> who<WG3739> is my beloved<WG27> and faithful<WG4103> child<WG5043> in the Lord,<WG2962> and he will remind<WG363> you of my ways<WG3598> which are in Christ,<WG5547> just<WG2531> as I teach<WG1321> everywhere<WG3837> in every<WG3956> church.<WG1577>
Now<WG1161> some<WG5100> have become arrogant,<WG5448> as though<WG5613> I were not coming<WG2064> to you.

But I will come<WG2064> to you soon,<WG5030> if<WG1437> the Lord<WG2962> wills,<WG2309> and I shall find<WG1097> out, not the words<WG3056> of those<WG3588> who are arrogant,<WG5448> but their power.<WG1411>
For the kingdom<WG932> of God<WG2316> does not consist in words,<WG3056> but in power.<WG1411>
What<WG5101> do you desire<WG2309>? Shall I come<WG2064> to you with a rod<WG4464> or<WG2228> with love<WG26> and a spirit<WG4151> of gentleness<WG4240>?
